D i s t r i b u t i o n Seychelles : Inner Seychelles ( Mahé , Praslin), Aldabra Group (Aldabra, Astove) – Madagascar : Prov. Mahajanga : Tsaramandroso – Prov. Antananarivo : Andrangoloaka, Andronobe, Antananarivo – Prov. Toamasina : Anosibe, Ivondro, Toamasina , Iles aux Prunes, Nosy Boraha (Sainte Marie) – Prov. Fianarantsoa : Ifanadiana, Mananjary, Massif d'Isalo – Prov. Toliara : Ampandrandava, Behara, Bekily, Beraketa, Fort Dauphin. – Réunion : Réunion – Mauritius : Mauritius .

Endemic to the Malagasy subregion. The synonymy of the subspecies described by TSUNEKI (1978) is not established formally. The characters of
Trypoxylon scutifrons
are variable ( LECLERCQ 1960 , 1961c ).
